text: Shin ɗayanku nã son cẽwa wani lambu ya kasance a gare shi daga dabĩnai da inabõbi' marẽmari suna gudãna daga ƙarƙashinsa, yana da, a cikinsa daga kõwane 'ya'yan itãce, kuma tsũfa ya sãme shi, alhãli kuwa yana da zũriyya masu rauni sai gũguwa wadda take a cikinta akwai wuta, ta sãme shi, har ta ƙõne? Kamar wancan ne Allah Yana bayyanãwar ãyõyi a gare ku, tsammãninku kuna tunãni
